name: Russian Police vs Terrorists
description:
Are you ready to revenge? Russian Police vs Terrorists – is an addictive police vendetta in russian city. There are a lot of crime here, and somebody have to fight with it. Counter a strike and shoot to kill – there will be only one winner! Repulse aggressors and try to survive in dangerous russian town!

Explore russian city and eject terrorists. Use all your sniper skills to defeat opponents and liberate the town.

Russian Police vs Terrorists shooter features:
• Crazy russian atmosphere;
• Sniper shooter in 3D;
• Elite force vs terrorists battle;
• Real russian streets;
• Realistic physic.

Russian Police vs Terrorists - extremely addictive simulator of a real war between police and gangstars. Shoot them down and stay alive!
